description: This file defines multiple Marshmallow schema classes for product management, including schemas for creating, updating, and returning product data, as well as a schema for total inventory balance.

classes.name: ProductBaseSchema
classes.description: Base schema with shared fields and validation for product name, price, and quantity.

classes.name: ProductCreateSchema
classes.description: Schema for creating a product, inherits from ProductBaseSchema, no additional fields.

classes.name: ProductUpdateSchema
classes.description: Schema for updating a product, all fields optional with validation.

classes.name: ProductSchema
classes.description: Schema for returning a product with an id.

classes.name: BalanceSchema
classes.description: Schema for returning total inventory value.

methods.name: validate_price
methods.description: Validates that the price is non-negative.

methods.name: validate_quantity
methods.description: Validates that the quantity is non-negative.
